gw.plugin.delinquency

Interface IDelinquencyProcessExtensions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IDelinquencyProcessExtensions
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Do not implement this plugin directly!

    The default plugin implementation simply in DelinquencyProcessExtensions.gs calls through to DelinquencyProcess extension methods. The recommended approach for implementors is to edit the DelinquencyProcess extension methods.

    Author:
    efoley

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<DelinquencyProcess> discoverPastDueDelinquencies(Account account)
      Called when charges are due and when holds are released on the account, resulting in a possible need for past due delinquency, and there are currently no holds on the account.
      void onChargesPaid(DelinquencyProcess delinquencyProcess, java.util.List<Charge> chargesPaid)
      Called when the Account or Policies associated with a delinquency process have been paid.
      void onCompliance(Collateral collateral)
      Called when the a Collateral has had the requirements allocated in a compliant manner.
      DelinquencyProcess onNonCompliance(Collateral collateral)
      Called when allocation on a Collateral has caused the Collateral to be noncompliant, resulting in a possible need for delinquency.
      void pushForwardHeldEvents(DelinquencyProcess delinquencyProcess, java.util.Date heldSince)
      Called when a hold is released, and the process is not targeted by other holds.

    • Method Detail

      • onChargesPaid

        void onChargesPaid(DelinquencyProcess delinquencyProcess,
                 java.util.List<Charge> chargesPaid)
        Called when the Account or Policies associated with a delinquency process have been paid. If, as a result of this payment, all Accounts/Policies targeted by the process are no longer delinquent, this method should trigger the delinquency process to exit delinquency.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyProcess - process for which payment has been applied to targets
        chargesPaid - List of Charges
        See Also:
        discoverPastDueDelinquencies(Account)

      • onCompliance

        void onCompliance(Collateral collateral)
        Called when the a Collateral has had the requirements allocated in a compliant manner. This method should trigger any active delinquency processes created by this collateral going delinquent, to exit delinquency.
        Parameters:
        collateral - The collateral which has now become compliant
        See Also:
        onNonCompliance(gw.bc.account.entity.Collateral)

      • pushForwardHeldEvents

        void pushForwardHeldEvents(DelinquencyProcess delinquencyProcess,
                         java.util.Date heldSince)
        Called when a hold is released, and the process is not targeted by other holds. Note that if the process is held by overlapping holds, this method is only called when the last hold is released and the process is free to execute.

        This method may alter the target date of future (not completed) events in order to delay them because of the hold.

        Parameters:
        delinquencyProcess - process which is no longer held
        heldSince - the date when this process was first held

      • discoverPastDueDelinquencies

        java.util.List<DelinquencyProcess> discoverPastDueDelinquencies(Account account)
        Called when charges are due and when holds are released on the account, resulting in a possible need for past due delinquency, and there are currently no holds on the account.
        Parameters:
        account - The account that potentially has past due charges on the policies, account level charges or collateral charges.
        Returns:
        a list of the delinquency processes that were discovered and started for this account
        See Also:
        onChargesPaid(gw.bc.delinquency.entity.DelinquencyProcess, List)

      • onNonCompliance

        DelinquencyProcess onNonCompliance(Collateral collateral)
        Called when allocation on a Collateral has caused the Collateral to be noncompliant, resulting in a possible need for delinquency.
        Parameters:
        collateral - The collateral that is non compliant
        Returns:
        the delinquency process that was started for this non compliant collateral.
        See Also:
        onCompliance(gw.bc.account.entity.Collateral)
